tweet: Hey Trippers - we just launched Tripping's Beta site! Here's the password: https://beta.tripping.com    UN: "beta"   PW: "trip415"
Tripping enables travelers to connect directly with each other - for travel tips, a shared cup of coffee and even home stays. It's awesome.
A journey is best measured in friends rather than miles ~ Tim Cahill.  Want to have friends all around the world? Tripping is for you.
Tripping is free, since we believe travel should be available and affordable for everyone.  Read more: https://beta.tripping.com/about/faq
Here are 3 reasons to join Tripping:  1. It's fun  2. It's free  3. It will change your life    (beta.tripping.com, UN-"beta", PW-"trip415")
